post.text: "We are black, we are proud, and here's why we are working to elect Hillary." Hillary for America staffers on why they're with her: hrc.io/2dCzSXz

comment.author: Benjamin
comment.text: Democrats have been lying to black America for a hundred years. Keeping blacks in slavery for a hundred years. Receiving votes and returning NOTHING. Trump wants to include ALL blacks and make them ALL Americans. He sees them not as black, but as equals. he wants jobs for black America and he will help them lift themselves out of poverty and the black American slums. Vote Trump to MAGA

replies.author: Avery
replies.text: HAHA you can't be serious you're clearly a troll...

replies.text: Hey Avery have you bothered to read the comments?
